reviews.text: Just a normal train station, not very pretty or particularly clean and the toilets cost money (20p). The staff are happy and friendly. When we went, our train was on time and we found the station fine. We got lost on the way from the station to the bus stop though and missed the bus. That's because the signs to the bus station are misleading. Better ask a member of staff or trust Maps to navigate.
It was ok. Nothing special. Toilets could be cleaner. Train left punctual.
Second time I have been delayed In Elgin and missed my change over to Kyle line. Get new trains!!!! Not that expensive

Like inverMESS bus station, notably Stagecoach & particularly MegaBus. Un-helpful. Obstructive. Dirty filthy trains. Notably windows, both inside & out. With rare exception the staff are just typical of inverMESS. Like the Council. Good for little or nothing! The notice boards should also have been left where they were above platform entrances where the sun seldom shone on it when then it was almost invariably clearly visible...now it's about as helpful as staff & management. Not very bright!
Spot on, fantastically friendly staff, clean trains, staff available to help, marvellous
